Hi @Hanger_Direct, not sure if ... your organic sales by keyword. I came across your post as I was looking for this as well. If you are brand registered then you will have access to Brand Analytics. The best I have found for getting this data is using the Search Query Performance in brand analytics. It will show you search terms, relevant to your ASIN (or your brand), and give some data (impressions, clicks, add to cart, and purchases) for you as well as total for all of Amazon.
